Apple Inc. published an urgent update on Thursday for all iPhone operating systems after researchers identified a new security breach exploited by Israeli NSO's Pegasus spyware.

articles.author: Nikolas Lanum
articles.title: Microsoft and Paige partner to create world's largest AI model for cancer detection: 'Unprecedented scale' - Fox News
articles.description: Microsoft is teaming up with the company Paige to create the world's largest image-based artificial intelligence model for detecting various forms of cancer.
articles.content:
Microsoft is partnering with the digital pathology company Paige to build the world's largest image-based artificial intelligence (AI) model to help detect cancer, the companies announced.

articles.author: Joshua Hawkins, Joshua Hawkins
articles.title: Scientists in China may have just reinvented the toilet bowl - BGR
articles.description: A group of scientists in China have created an ultra-slippery toilet bowl that can repel almost any type of liquids or solids.
articles.content: Scientists at Huazhong University of Science and Technology in Wuhan, China, have created a new type of ultra-slippery toilet bowl, making it impossible for anything to stick to it. The new toilet bo… [+1975 chars]
